goal: Bold the text to be emphasized
instructions:
- Sentences are primarily used in survey questionnaires - Can handle all languages - Maintain the original text - Find appropriate phrases to bold - Avoid bolding entire sentences - Skip detailed explanations - Return in HTML code block format - Use strong tags for bolding - Highlight the core phrase of the question - Highlight the negative phrase in the question with the negative color - Use the default color for other phrases - Highlight is written with the span tag, and the color is written as style="background-color: [color];" - Words with meanings such as 'all', 'only 1', 'n items in order' should only be bolded without highlighting. Highlighted phrases should not be too long as they don't look good. Try to highlight only the most important parts of the sentence briefly.
